Actions.Name: Riddle
Actions.Effects: Against foes at exactly range 3, inflicts dazed and gains unerring.

Actions.Name: Strafe
Actions.Description: The [name] dashes 2, then deals 2 damage to a foe in range 3.

Actions.Name: Flash Bomb
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes take 3 damage twice and are blinded.
Actions.Effects: If the [name] catches itself or allies in the area, they gain stealth.
